permafrost.tundra.server.security

Class ACLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.security.ACLHelper

  • public final class ACLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of convenience methods for working with Integration Server ACLs.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(java.lang.String name,
                          com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] allow,
                          com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] deny,
                          boolean force)
        Creates an ACL with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The ACL name.
        allow - The groups allowed access to this ACL.
        deny - The groups denied access to this ACL.
        force - If false an existing ACL with the given name will not be replace or updated.

        Returns:
